name: Mathias Weske
content: Business Process Technology | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Mathias Weske Business Process Technology The Business Process Technology research group aims at addressing real-world BPM problems with formal approaches and engineering useful prototypes. Our research covers a broad range of topics in business process management including flexible processes choreographies, case management, robotic process automation, and process mining. Our application domains are mainly healthcare and logistics. Prof. Dr. Mathias Weske Function Head of Business Process Technology Room C-2.7 Phone: +49 331 5509-191 Mail: mathias.weske@hpi.de Office Lisann Dittberner Office Assistant for Business Process Technology Phone: +49 331 5509-180 Mail: office-weske@hpi.de About the research group HomeTeachingResearchTeam Last change: 18/02/2025, Mareike-Vic Schreiber
